q_en: What are the sewing tasks of Premier Sewers?
gt:
Sure! Here are the sewing tasks for the "Premier Sewers" working group:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status     |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|------------|
| 2       | 2024-02-02       | 2024-02-15       | 2                | 240            | 240              | Completed  |
| 3       | 2024-01-19       | 2024-02-08       | 3                | 150            | 150              | Completed  |
| 11      | 2024-03-21       | 2024-04-14       | 11               | 140            | 100              | In Progress|
| 26      | 2024-05-04       | 2024-05-15       | 26               | 70             | 70               | In Progress|
| 32      | 2024-06-17       | 2024-07-14       | 32               | 150            | 0                | Not Started|

The "Premier Sewers" team has been busy! Some tasks are already completed, while others are still in progress or yet to start. Keep up the great work, team! ğŸ˜„

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Premier Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Premier Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, op.id AS order_product_id, op.number AS planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.working_group_id = '9';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the working group "Premier Sewers"
